text:
Auburn is a city in Shawnee County, Kansas, United States. In 2010, 1,227 people lived there.
Geography.
Auburn is at (38.906709, -95.816789). The United States Census Bureau says that the city has a total area of. All of it is land.
Weather.
Auburn has hot, humid summers and generally mild to cool winters. The Köppen Climate Classification system says that Auburn has a humid subtropical climate, abbreviated "Cfa" on climate maps.
People.
Auburn is part of the Topeka, Kansas Metropolitan Statistical Area.
2010 census.
The 2010 census says that there were 1,227 people, 467 households, and 320 families living in Auburn.
